author: Woozie
title: Minifig birthing?
review:
This set is my oldest and I have very few memories of really playing with it. It is slightly creepy. Seems like it is the Adam and Eve of Lego if you will. I have know idea how I ever received this set, since I didn't really get into Lego until about 1984. I assume it was from a small store with some old inventory.

As far as the parts go, the mother and father figures are quite unique, and the baseplate is also completely different than anything I've ever seen.

All in all though, this is a timepiece and I'm glad I still have it with original box and all the paperwork to go with it.
